marklogic.body: Let's see, what did happen to Postal reform? Congress -- which has Bled USPS dry, particularly by requiring it to prefund 75 years' worth of future retiree health benefits within 10 years (to create a $44 Billion Congressional slush fund) -- is now upset because the Postal Service is having to cut services to their constituents. If Congress would finally Act and grant some meaningful relief, none of this would be necessary. Congress created this problem, and only Congress can fix it.
